title: AGIJobs Economic Power Launch

controls.description: Owner reduces maximum job duration to enforce faster settlement loops and higher capital velocity.
Owner increases validator quorum for premium workstreams to maintain uncompromising trust levels.
Owner upgrades fiat on/off-ramp adapter with improved slippage guarantees.

circuitBreakers.description: Pause contracts if validator confidence slips below 95% to protect settlement integrity.
Recalibrate automation if orchestration coverage drops under 80%.
Trigger treasury forensic audit when buffers fall below the defensive floor.

upgradePaths.description: Ships the hardened JobRegistry bundle with deterministic migration plan.
Activates the upgraded validator commit–reveal consensus parameters.
Rebalances stake requirements to throttle spam and fortify incentives.

parameterControls.description: Owner reduces maximum job duration to enforce faster settlement loops and higher capital velocity.
Owner increases validator quorum for premium workstreams to maintain uncompromising trust levels.
Owner upgrades fiat on/off-ramp adapter with improved slippage guarantees.

circuitBreakers.description: Pause contracts if validator confidence slips below 95% to protect settlement integrity.
Recalibrate automation if orchestration coverage drops under 80%.
Trigger treasury forensic audit when buffers fall below the defensive floor.

upgradePaths.description: Ships the hardened JobRegistry bundle with deterministic migration plan.
Activates the upgraded validator commit–reveal consensus parameters.
Rebalances stake requirements to throttle spam and fortify incentives.

controls.description: Compress execution windows and rebalance automation buffers to accelerate delivery.
Deterministically assign Helios Sovereign Build Hub through the multi-sig orchestrator.
Intensify validator commit–reveal quorums for the accelerator deliverables.
Re-sequence dependent jobs and broadcast updated SLAs to the agent mesh.
Reassign workload to Atlas Strategic Model Forge with enforced throughput targets.
Execute the governance upgrade runbook with deterministic multi-sig confirmations.
Trigger Sentinel Assurance Fabric to publish upgrade attestation packages.
Scale omniloop marketing spend and unlock global demand channels.
Throttle expansion loops to preserve validator bandwidth during bursts.
Roll out upgraded oracle attestations and enable fallback feeds.
Shift execution to Helios backup endpoints with synchronized credentials.
Rotate Validator Alpha out of committee and replace with standby guardian.
Increase Validator Alpha stake to reinforce quorum incentives.
Execute slashing for misbehavior and redistribute stake to the treasury buffer.
Rotate Validator Beta and stream a fresh compliance attestation.
Increase Validator Beta stake to reinforce compliance oversight.
Rotate Validator Gamma to refresh macro-economic oversight inputs.
Publish validator policy brief to PolicyStudio dashboards.
Rotate Validator Delta to refresh machine learning evaluation coverage.
Push the latest adversarial defense patch set across validator enclaves.
Rotate Validator Epsilon to refresh red-team coverage.
Increase adversarial inference testing depth for high-value jobs.
Promote the audited USDC adapter bundle with reduced slippage.
Sweep stablecoin float into the operations buffer to match demand spikes.
Execute deterministic registry migration with downtime-free contract swap.
Pause only job intake while keeping settlement modules live.
Rebalance stake thresholds to gate workload parallelism.
Execute protocol slashing and recycle penalties into treasury.
Increase validator quorum and commit windows for high-value cycles.
Reset commit–reveal session and rotate the validator roster.
Boost reputation weighting for premium validators and agents.
Purge underperforming actors and refresh scoring baselines.
Escalate to extended jury with deterministic draw.
Delegate dispute outcome to the emergency council multi-sig.
Rotate IPFS metadata anchors for issued certificates.
Freeze certificate minting in response to governance halt.

ownerCommandPlan.coverageNarrative: Owner multi-sig holds deterministic runbooks for every critical surface.

assertions.title: Owner multi-sig commands every economic lever
assertions.summary: Coverage exceeds 90%, ensuring deterministic owner runbooks across modules, pause hooks, and parameter updates.

assertions.title: All modules sit under governed safes
assertions.summary: Every module remains under the owner multi-sig or treasury guardian.

assertions.title: Job to agent skill alignment remains above 60%
assertions.summary: All assignments meet the skill-match threshold, confirming intelligent routing.

assertions.title: Validator quorums and confidence exceed defensive floor
assertions.summary: Validator sets satisfy quorum requirements with >90% confidence.

assertions.title: Treasury remains solvent after every execution step
assertions.summary: Treasury balance stays positive throughout the execution timeline.

assertions.title: Automation loop exceeds 82% coverage
assertions.summary: Automation score surpasses the autonomy target – human intervention remains optional.

assertions.title: Economic dominance index holds unstoppable band
assertions.summary: Dominance tier secured – the orchestration mesh operates at unstoppable sovereign capacity.

controlScripts.description: Rebalance stake thresholds to gate workload parallelism.
Execute protocol slashing and recycle penalties into treasury.

modules.name: ValidationModule
modules.description: Commit–reveal validator consensus spine enforcing deliverable correctness.

controlScripts.description: Increase validator quorum and commit windows for high-value cycles.
Reset commit–reveal session and rotate the validator roster.

modules.name: ReputationEngine
modules.description: Aggregates performance signals to prioritise elite agents and validators in the matching fabric.

controlScripts.description: Boost reputation weighting for premium validators and agents.
Purge underperforming actors and refresh scoring baselines.

modules.name: DisputeModule
modules.description: Escalation and arbitration flow for contested deliverables with automated jury selection.

controlScripts.description: Escalate to extended jury with deterministic draw.
Delegate dispute outcome to the emergency council multi-sig.

modules.name: CertificateNFT
modules.description: Mints proof-of-completion artefacts for employers and downstream compliance attestations.

controlScripts.description: Rotate IPFS metadata anchors for issued certificates.
Freeze certificate minting in response to governance halt.
Promote the audited USDC adapter bundle with reduced slippage.
Sweep stablecoin float into the operations buffer to match demand spikes.

details: ValidationModule • Execute npm run owner:upgrade to promote

governanceLedger.dominanceVerdict: Dominance tier secured – the orchestration mesh operates at unstoppable sovereign capacity.

dominanceReport.verdict: Dominance tier secured – the orchestration mesh operates at unstoppable sovereign capacity.
dominanceReport.narrative: Composite index 93.77% fuses owner coverage, custody, validator certainty, automation, and economic velocity. Cross-check variance 0.84% confirms triple-verification integrity.
methodology: Weighted composite prioritises command custody and validator confidence.
Geometric and harmonic guardrails actively hunt for hidden weak links.
Economic velocity injects ROI and throughput to prove macro-scale value creation.

components.label: Owner command coverage
components.description: Portion of economic surfaces with deterministic multi-sig commands.

components.label: Sovereign control score
components.description: Share of deployed modules anchored under owner custody.

components.label: Validator confidence
components.description: Commit–reveal quorum strength across validation committees.

components.label: Automation score
components.description: Autonomous orchestration coverage across the execution mesh.

components.label: Stability index
components.description: Composite resilience gauge blending risk mitigations and buffers.

components.label: Assertion pass rate
components.description: Share of verification assertions exceeding unstoppable thresholds.

components.label: Economic velocity
components.description: Throughput and ROI converted into a 0–1 sovereignty readiness scale.

crossChecks.label: Weighted mean
crossChecks.methodology: Primary weighted composite emphasising owner custody and validator strength.
crossChecks.notes: Governing score used for escalation and launch readiness decisions.

crossChecks.label: Arithmetic baseline
crossChecks.notes: Confirms no component skews the composite through weighting bias.

crossChecks.label: Geometric guardrail
crossChecks.notes: Ensures no hidden surface drops below unstoppable tolerance.

crossChecks.label: Harmonic fail-safe
crossChecks.notes: Triggers reinforcements if a single component drifts downward.

integrity.details: All dominance components exceed the 75% sovereignty guardrail.
